name: Config 2021 Name Card - Clu Soh
description:
Since 2017, addicted with Figma as my primary design tool and bring it to the team. After few weeks discover Figma. We iFREE GROUP DESIGN switching from Sketch to Figma. After 4 years of Figma user, I become Figma Community Advocate (Friends of Figma, GuangZhou) continue promote Figma in China, and more people who don't design but want to learn and try. The power of Figma is able us to share the design knowledge and joys to others easily. Can't wait for more excited feature and news coming on Config 2021.


Reach me on: @designedbyclu or join us @fof_china
